name: Dragon Ball Z Chou Saiya Densetsu
name_original: Dragon Ball Z Chou Saiya Densetsu
description:
Dragon Ball Z Chou Saiya Densetsu is a RPG-card game developed by Tose Software. It came out on 25-01-1992. Bandai published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
You can play Dragon Ball Z Chou Saiya Densetsu on SNES.
